alert.note: Alert for La Salle; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 2:55AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern La Salle and Webb Counties through 400 AM CDT... At 254 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Catarina to near Las Tiendas to near Columbia Bridge to 27 miles southwest of Ranchos Penitas West. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Laredo, Encinal, Rio Bravo, El Cenizo, Ranchos Penitas West, Columbia Bridge, Fort Ewell Site, United South High School, Artesia Wells, Aguilares, Doctors Hospital Of Laredo, Callaghan, Texas A&M, Las Tiendas, Laredo International Airport, Botines, Unitec Industrial Park, La Esperanza Ranch Airport, Ranchitos Las Lomas and St Augustine High School South Laredo. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 1 and 62. US Highway 59 between mile markers 786 and 824. US Highway 83 between mile markers 668 and 734. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
